ekspolanka samuhayata wishishta sammana 4kekspolanka holdings anubaddhitha ekspolanka pudgalika samagama, ekspolanka fe්rat, helo korp pudgalika samagama yana samagam thunama 2011 wasare jathika apanayanakaruwange mandalaya wisin pawathwana lada sammana uleledi ransammana 2 k, ridi sammanayak saha wishesha agayim sammanayakin pidum labiya.1978 shri lankawe nawum palathuru saha elawalu apanayanayen arambaana lada ekspolanka pudgalika samagama mehidi maha parimana apanayana kandaye wishishtathama ekathu kala watinakam sahitha krushikarmika apanayanakaruwa lesa ek ran sammanayakda, wadath kapipenena ekathu kala watinakam sahitha krushikarmika apanayanakaruwa lesa thawath ran sammanayak da dina ganna ladi.madaperadiga, madhyadharani, api්rakawa, oostreliyawa, yuropaya saha eksath rajadhaniya aadi ratawala apanayana kshethraye pramukhathama kriyakarithwayak athi ekspolanka pudgalika samagama mema nishpadana sandaha pasugiya wasara gananawak thula dawanthama apanayanakaru wiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

kenekuge ranganaya piliba`dawa thewanna mathin niewidanayak himi karagatha haki hakiyi.ෙmi mathata nisi poshana sapayana rawi bohowita janmiya thula rangana hakiyawan pubudu karanu athi.thewannath rawi piliba`dawath wimasima thulin janmayage athi hakiyawan piliba`dawa awabodhayak himi karagatha hakiyi.mehidi budha lasikuru ha purapasa sa`du aadihu kalakaruwage yahapath manasika matitamak athi kara usas ranganayak wetha yomu karanu labayi.sa`du dushya wima menma guruge kalamanakarithwayak nomathi wu wita kalakaruwada thama dakshatha nisilesa gunathmakawa pelagaswa ganiemi dushkarathawayaka yedenu atha.emagin bihiwana nirmana niyama rasayen lagunayen yuktha nowanu atha.esema ewani ganathmaka bawin midunu nirmana samaja gathawimada ekthara aakarayakata samajaya dushanaya wimak lesa salakiya hakiyi.meya ekthara ayurin papakarmayak lesa hadinwiya hakiyi.rasayanika drawya yeda kruthima idawanu labana palathurak rasayath sbawikawa idinu palatha.ුre rasayath athara wenasbawa meyata udaharanayaki.

ee pilibandawa pahatha hadisaya pahadili karayi. 1772 - حَدَّثَنَا عَبْدَانُ عَنْ أَبِي حَمْزَةَ عَنْ الْأَعْمَشِ عَنْ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ عَلْقَمَةَ قَالَ بَيْنَا أَنَا أَمْشِي مَعَ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُ فَقَالَ كُنَّا مَعَ النَّبِيِّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ فَقَالَ مَنْ اسْتَطَاعَ الْبَاءَةَ فَلْيَتَزَوَّجْ فَإِنَّهُ أَغَضُّ لِلْبَصَرِ وَأَحْصَنُ لِلْفَرْجِ وَمَنْ لَمْ يَسْتَطِعْ فَعَلَيْهِ بِالصَّوْمِ فَإِنَّهُ لَهُ وِجَاءٌ رواه البخاري “numbaalagen yam kisi kenek nadaththuwa sandaha hakiyawak pawathi da ohu wiwahayak sidu kara ganithwa!
